abstract: The authors present a brief review of the problem of diabetes insipidus in neurosurgical patients, with particular emphasis on the differential diagnosis of postoperative and posttraumatic polyuria and the management of diabetes insipidus in these periods. A listing of drugs currently used in its treatment is given.
